outsidemode.title: Do you want to see the OUTSIDE temperature? If not, the plugin will provide INSIDE temperature.
outsidemode.description: Can be set to true or false

apiroute.title: URI of the WIFI controller.
apiroute.description: Should be in the format of: http://aaa.bbb.ccc.ddd or https://aaa.bbb.ccc.ddd

temperatureOffset.title: Temperature-Offset
temperatureOffset.description: Allows an offset to calibrate the measurement.

uuid.title: Client UUID token. Only needed for some models.
uuid.description: Should be a 32 digit hex string

system.title: Controller Type
system.description: Select your WiFi controller type: 'Default' for standard Daikin WiFi modules (BRP069xxx) or 'Skyfi' for Skyfi controllers.

response.title: Response
response.description: Timeout in milliseconds for the device to start responding.  Default: 2000 (2 seconds).

deadline.title: Deadline
deadline.description: Timeout in milliseconds for the device to complete a response.  Default: 60000 (one minute).

retries.title: Retries
retries.description: The plugin can retry to reconnect in case of a connection problem. Default: 5.
